trans-unit.source: An overview of the authentication protocols supported by Azure Active Directory (AD)
trans-unit.target: An overview of the authentication protocols supported by Azure Active Directory (AD)

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) supports several of the most widely used authentication and authorization protocols.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) supports several of the most widely used authentication and authorization protocols.

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section describe the supported protocols and their implementation in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section describe the supported protocols and their implementation in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: The topics included a review of supported claim types, an introduction to the use of federation metadata, detailed OAuth 2.0.
trans-unit.target: The topics included a review of supported claim types, an introduction to the use of federation metadata, detailed OAuth 2.0.

trans-unit.source: and SAML 2.0 protocol reference documentation, and a troubleshooting section.
trans-unit.target: and SAML 2.0 protocol reference documentation, and a troubleshooting section.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Important Information About Signing Key Rollover in Azure AD</linkText><title></title> – Learn about Azure AD’s signing key rollover cadence, changes you can make to update the key automatically, and discussion for how to update the most common application scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Important Information About Signing Key Rollover in Azure AD</linkText><title></title> – Learn about Azure AD’s signing key rollover cadence, changes you can make to update the key automatically, and discussion for how to update the most common application scenarios.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Supported Token and Claim Types</linkText><title></title> - Learn about the claims in the tokens that Azure AD issue.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Supported Token and Claim Types</linkText><title></title> - Learn about the claims in the tokens that Azure AD issue.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Federation Metadata</linkText><title></title> - Learn how to find and interpret the metadata documents that Azure AD generates.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Federation Metadata</linkText><title></title> - Learn how to find and interpret the metadata documents that Azure AD generates.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD</linkText><title></title> - Learn about the implementation of OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD</linkText><title></title> - Learn about the implementation of OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>OpenID Connect 1.0</linkText><title></title> - Learn how to use OAuth 2.0, an authorization protocol, for authentication.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>OpenID Connect 1.0</linkText><title></title> - Learn how to use OAuth 2.0, an authorization protocol, for authentication.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>SAML Protocol Reference</linkText><title></title> - Learn about the Single Sign-On and Single Sign-out SAML profiles of Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>SAML Protocol Reference</linkText><title></title> - Learn about the Single Sign-On and Single Sign-out SAML profiles of Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>WS-Federation 1.2</linkText><title></title> - Learn about WS-Federation 1.2 in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>WS-Federation 1.2</linkText><title></title> - Learn about WS-Federation 1.2 in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Troubleshooting Authentication Protocols</linkText><title></title> - Learn how to prevent problems and interpret and resolve errors when using Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Troubleshooting Authentication Protocols</linkText><title></title> - Learn how to prevent problems and interpret and resolve errors when using Azure AD.
